to wallet data on your application

Make sure you remember it.

security password description: Create a password to access your wallet
access my wallet description:
Welcome to BD Wallet, add wallet to manage your assets,
control your multi assets in a single interface
import mnemonic phrase description: A mnemonic phrase or mnemonic seed is a set of typically either 12 or 24 words, which can be used to derive an infinite number of wallets.
use mnemonic phrase backup description: Mnemonic phrase backup is your mnemonic encryption data. It includes an encryption password you set by yourself.
connect ledger device description: “Ledger” is a hardware wallet that is used for the storage of and transactions in popular cryptocurrencies
mnemonic description:
Please enter your mnemonic phrase in order and
make sure your mnemonic is written correctly
what is mnemonic description:
The mnemonic is used to derive multiple private keys. It is a unique wallet phrase that gives you a human readable format of words to backup your wallet for recovery. It is typically a phrase that allows you to access an infinite number of accounts. At its purest form it is a pattern of letters, words or associations that help you remember the information easily. It is used by Ledger, TREZOR, MetaMask, Jaxx and others.

The accounts you can access with this phrase are determined by the technical “path”. imToken allows you to import a wallet using the mnemonic from different paths. However, you cannot export a private key on imToken.

Here is an example of what it should look like:

scissors invite lock maple supreme raw rapid void congress muscle digital elegant little brisk hair mango congress clump

Remember: We do not save your wallet password and mnemonic in our server, once forgotten, it cannot be recovered.
select currencies: Select the currencies you want to import
backup password description: In oder to export your mnemonic properly, we need a password with it will be encrypted for security reasons. Please insert below passwords that you will also be required later when importing it.
export mnemonic description: You can export this data whenever you want, even sending it to a friend of yours for backup, if you have used a strong enough password.
delete wallet warning: Are you sure you would like to delete this wallet?
